low_cloud.label: Tension
low_cloud.visual_characteristics: Bright lighting, clean surfaces, active NPCs
low_cloud.audio_characteristics: Clear sounds, music, conversation, optimistic tone

mid_cloud.label: Wander
mid_cloud.description: Nostalgic, ambient, liminal but not threatening
mid_cloud.visual_characteristics: Soft lighting, worn surfaces, mixed occupancy

high_cloud.label: Surge
high_cloud.visual_characteristics: Stale lighting, empty spaces, single glowing elements
high_cloud.audio_characteristics: HVAC drone, fluorescent buzz, silence, auditory hallucinations
high_cloud.npc_behavior: Slow drift, isolated, minimal interaction, echo behavior

tier_1.label: Soft Bleed
tier_1.visual_effects: Screen flicker, light bloom, subtle geometry shift
tier_1.audio_effects: Audio/visual desync, faint echoes, phantom sounds
tier_1.gameplay_effects: NPCs begin contradictory behavior, navigation anomalies

tier_2.label: Moderate Bleed
tier_2.visual_effects: Surfaces shimmer, doors appear/disappear, temporal overlays
tier_2.audio_effects: Layered temporal audio, spatial desync, impossible sounds
tier_2.gameplay_effects: NPCs phase through boundaries, zones shift connections

tier_3.label: Severe Bleed
tier_3.visual_effects: Era superposition, recursive geometry, non-euclidean space
tier_3.gameplay_effects: Navigation breaks, NPCs become recursive, player displacement

tier_4_plus.label: Cascade Bleed
tier_4_plus.description: Full reality collapse, use sparingly for climactic moments
tier_4_plus.visual_effects: Multiple eras visible simultaneously, mall topology inverts
tier_4_plus.audio_effects: All temporal layers audible at once, echo recursion
tier_4_plus.gameplay_effects: Narrative scripted sequence, not normal gameplay

pressure_propagation.description: How cloud pressure spreads between zones

pressure_venting.note: When pressure > threshold, venting begins at rate per tick

cloud_prime_nodes.description: Special zones that generate cloud pressure

nodes.note: Primary cloud generator, subsurface geometry causes natural glitch pressure

node_interactions.resonance: Prime nodes amplify each other when pressure aligns
node_interactions.cascade_trigger: If 2+ prime nodes exceed 80 pressure, bleed cascade begins
node_interactions.stabilization: Player presence at prime node reduces generation rate by 50%

time_of_day.description: Cloud pressure varies by time of day
time_of_day.note: Night has highest pressure (fewer people, less 'life' normalizing space)

day_of_week.note: More traffic on weekends = lower pressure

seasonal.note: Holiday shopping season normalizes space significantly

population_effects.description: NPC population density affects cloud pressure
population_effects.note: Life normalizes space; empty spaces accumulate pressure

contradiction_tracking.description: System for tracking reality contradictions that trigger bleed

contradiction_decay.note: Contradictions decay over time if not reinforced
